main event: A civilian man observed a brilliant white light from his apartment in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania on August 1, 1952.
interesting points: The light was described as bright as a single headlight of a car., The observer saw the object moving upward at a high rate of speed., The sighting lasted only about three to four seconds., No sound or exhaust was reported from the object., The weather was clear with ten miles visibility at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: brilliant white light in the sky
witness description: a civilian man of average intelligence
